mapper.select: SELECT pdo.product_option_id AS productOptionId, pd.product_name AS productName, pd.product_base_price +pdo.additional_price AS price, color_cd.code_name AS color, size_cd.code_name AS sizes FROM modeling.product pd, modeling.product_option pdo JOIN modeling.code color_cd ON pdo.product_color = color_cd.code_group_id AND pdo.color = color_cd.code_id JOIN modeling.code size_cd ON pdo.product_size = size_cd.code_group_id AND pdo.size = size_cd.code_id where pd.product_id = pdo.product_id and pdo.product_option_id = #{productOptionId}

SELECT order_id AS orderId, user_id AS userId, order_st_cd.code_name AS orderStatus, total_amount AS totalAmount, DATE_FORMAT(order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS orderDate, -- order_date AS orderDate, delivery_fee AS shippingFee, coupon_discount AS couponDiscount, point_used AS pointUse, payment_method AS paymentMethod FROM modeling.order_master od JOIN modeling.code order_st_cd ON od.order_status_group = order_st_cd.code_group_id AND od.order_status_code = order_st_cd.code_id where order_id = #{orderId} ;

SELECT order_id AS orderId, recipient_name AS recipientName, phone_number AS recipientPhone, address AS address, address_detail AS addressDetail, postal_code AS postalCode, delivery_request AS deliveryRequest FROM modeling.order_delivery where order_id = #{orderId} ;

SELECT od.product_option_id AS productOptionId, COUNT(*) AS quantities, SUM(od.order_price) AS prices, pd.product_name AS productName, color_cd.code_name AS color, size_cd.code_name AS sizes FROM modeling.order_detail od JOIN modeling.product_option pdo ON od.product_option_id = pdo.product_option_id JOIN modeling.product pd ON pd.product_id = pdo.product_id JOIN modeling.code color_cd ON pdo.product_color = color_cd.code_group_id AND pdo.color = color_cd.code_id JOIN modeling.code size_cd ON pdo.product_size = size_cd.code_group_id AND pdo.size = size_cd.code_id WHERE od.order_id = #{orderId} GROUP BY od.product_option_id, pd.product_name, pd.product_base_price, pdo.additional_price, color_cd.code_name, size_cd.code_name;
mapper.insert: insert into modeling.order_master( user_id, total_amount, delivery_fee, coupon_discount, product_type_count, total_quantity, point_used, payment_method ) VALUE ( #{userId}, #{totalAmount}, #{shippingFee}, #{discount}, #{totalCount}, #{totalQuantity}, #{pointUse}, #{paymentMethod} )

INSERT INTO modeling.order_delivery ( order_id, address_name, recipient_name, phone_number, address, address_detail, postal_code, delivery_request ) value( #{orderId}, '', #{recipientName}, #{recipientPhone}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{postalCode}, #{deliveryRequest} ) ;
